001
002package com.commercetools.api.json;
003
004import java.util.Optional;
005
006import com.commercetools.api.models.cart.ReplicaCartDraft;
007import com.commercetools.api.models.common.*;
008import com.commercetools.api.models.product.AttributeImpl;
009import com.commercetools.api.models.review.Review;
010import com.commercetools.api.models.type.FieldContainerImpl;
011import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.module.SimpleModule;
012
013import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.utils.json.modules.ModuleOptions;
014
015/**
016 * Module to configure the default jackson {@link com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper} e.g. to deserialize attributes and custom fields
017 */
018public class ApiModule extends SimpleModule {
019    private static final long serialVersionUID = 0L;
020
021    public ApiModule(ModuleOptions options) {
022        boolean attributeAsDateString = Boolean.parseBoolean(
023            Optional.ofNullable(options.getOption(ApiModuleOptions.DESERIALIZE_DATE_ATTRIBUTE_AS_STRING))
024                    .orElse(System.getProperty(ApiModuleOptions.DESERIALIZE_DATE_ATTRIBUTE_AS_STRING)));
025        boolean customFieldAsDateString = Boolean
026                .parseBoolean(Optional.ofNullable(options.getOption(ApiModuleOptions.DESERIALIZE_DATE_FIELD_AS_STRING))
027                        .orElse(System.getProperty(ApiModuleOptions.DESERIALIZE_DATE_FIELD_AS_STRING)));
028        addDeserializer(AttributeImpl.class, new AtrributeDeserializer(attributeAsDateString));
029        addDeserializer(FieldContainerImpl.class, new CustomFieldDeserializer(customFieldAsDateString));
030        setMixInAnnotation(Review.class, ReviewMixin.class);
031        setMixInAnnotation(ReplicaCartDraft.class, ReplicaCartDraftMixin.class);
032    }
033}
